attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern,

I am a prospective adoptive parent for an international adoption. I just recently
reapplied for another I600 as the first expired after 18 months. Most international
adoptions can not be completed in that time frame and prospective adoptive
parents have to apply and pay the full fee twice as opposed to a renewal fee. The
proposed fee twice is quite a deterrent to adoption. After 7 years of infertlity
treatment, we borrowed to be able to adopt and fulfill our dream of being parents.
The drastic increase in fees will limit that dream for many. Please consider not
raising the fees so high or having a cheaper renewal fee for the second time.

Thanks
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lauren Veit
